Title: Relates to increasing penalties for certain violations committed by combination gas and electric corporations
Summary: Establishes increased penalties for combination gas and electric corporations that violate provisions of the public service law designed to protect the overall reliability and continuity of electric service.
LawCode: Amd ยง25-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to increasing penalties for certain violations committed by combination gas and electric corporations
